Name: Rhine Wine Cobbler
Ingredients: 2 wedge Pineapple (fresh) cored, skinned and chopped
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Goblet glass .
Prepare garnish of a grape, orange slice wheel and pineapple wedge.
MUDDLE grapes and pineapple in base of shaker.
FINE STRAIN (without shaking) into glass filled with crushed ice.
COBBLE (churn/stir) with barspoon to thoroughly mix.
Garnish with grape, orange slice and pineapple wedge.
Review: Light, fruity and very refreshing. A fruity alternative to a spritz.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Johnson 's 1882 New And Improved Bartender's Manual .
